references.paper_title: High probability and risk-averse guarantees for stochastic saddle point problems
references.reason: This is the authors' own work, forming the basis of the current paper, providing high probability bounds for stochastic minimax problems.

references.paper_title: Clipped stochastic methods for variational inequalities with heavy-tailed noise
references.reason: This paper is crucial because it provides high-probability complexity guarantees for variational inequalities with heavy-tailed noise, a problem closely related to the focus of the current work.

references.paper_title: Solving variational inequalities with stochastic mirror-prox algorithm
references.reason: This paper is foundational for high-probability analysis of stochastic methods for solving variational inequalities.

references.paper_title: A stochastic GDA method with backtracking for solving nonconvex (strongly) concave minimax problems
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it presents a novel algorithm for solving nonconvex-concave minimax problems with high-probability complexity guarantees, thus providing a direct comparison point for the current paper’s contributions.

references.paper_title: Faster single-loop algorithms for minimax optimization without strong concavity
references.reason: This paper is important due to its focus on single-loop methods for minimax optimization, providing a benchmark for the current work’s single-loop sm-AGDA algorithm analysis.
